availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
State of Kentucky
Meade County Sct
7th April 1862
"This day the resignation of Herod C Reid a Justice of the Peace of this County was produced in Court and ordered to be entered of record, reading as follows viz.
"To the Honorable Judge Meade County Court I hereby tender to you my resignation as Justice of the Peace in District No 4. Meade County, yours Respectfully

The Court therefore declared the Office of Justice as held by said Read in District No 4. vacated, and recommends to his Excellency B McGoffin Governor of this Commonwealth Richard J Patterson, as a fit person to fill said vacancy."

A Copy
Att. Wm Fairleigh Clk
Meade County Court

Richd. J. Patterson
Recommended as Justice of The Peace for Meade County.
District No. 4.
